AI Description: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink.
Core Features: Multi-Protocol & Multi-Source Command-Line Download Utility, Supports Http/Https, Ftp, Sftp, Bittorrent, Metalink, Configurable Download Settings, Batch Downloading, Download Resuming, Parallel Downloads
General Tags: Download Manager, Command-Line Tool, Multi-Protocol, Multi-Source, File Transfer
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
